alert.note: Alert for Grayson; Smyth; Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 31 at 3:22AM EDT until March 31 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Grayson, Tazewell and Smyth Counties, especially the higher elevations. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging high winds will result in downed trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult at times, especially for high profile vehicles and especially across the higher terrain.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use extra caution if driving in areas of high winds. High profile vehicles, such as campers and tractor-trailers are most susceptible to high winds. Winds will be the strongest across the higher elevations and through mountain passes where cross winds present an even greater danger. Secure any loose outdoor objects.
